Uses of Class
com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp.Connection

    • Uses of Connection in com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp

      Methods in com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp that return types with arguments of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Connection> Server.getConnections()
      Returns all the connections currently connected to the Server.
      Methods in com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ServerListener.onConnect​(Connection conn)
      This method should be called when a Client connects to the Server
      It is called by the Server class when a Client connects
      void ServerListener.onDisconnect​(Connection conn)
      This method should be called when a Client disconnects from the Server
      It is called by the Connection class when the Client disconnects
      void ServerListener.onReceive​(Connection conn, java.lang.Object obj)
      This method should be called when the Server received something from a Client It is called by the Connection class when it receives something
